resource.chars:
<s>Now as regards the adhesion between the <u>tunics<\u>
in the two genera salpa & pyrosoma whether the phrase be meant 
to refer to the amount of adhesion of the [text?]
to the outer tunic, or of the outer & inner tunics 
together there is absolutely no <\s>
However with regard to the two genera in 
question - whatever the nature of the two membranes 
of which they are composed there is absolutely no 
* And it may be added in the genus Anchinaia 
described in Wiegmanns Archiv for 1833 - which seems
to be a most interesting transition form between the 
Salpae and Doliolum - if indeed it be not the 
young form of Doliolum caudatum itself -
* See also on the homologies of the branchial 
organs of the Salpae and ordinary tunicata 
M Milne Edwards sur les Ascidies Composees p.55.
